subject: the circus
body:
![Screenshot 2024-05-30 at 7.35.48 AM.jpeg](/letters/images/238.jpg) 

i made [a video of kenneth koch reading his poem "the circus"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hafOgdv6UmM) set to [clips of late 50s new york](https://archive.org/details/0675_City_of_Magic_05_25_14_00). (previously: [on khloe kardashian and "the circus"](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/thank-you-notes-131/))
